data.title: Great for a STARBUCKS
data.text: It is a Starbucks, like all others.  the staff is great and very helpful.  They are great at listening to you order and getting it right and very friendly.  They even give us "PUP"acinos for our puppies.  Wish they had a set down area, but that didn't seem to be in the best interest of the City Of Casper.

data.title: Glad there was a starbucks by hotel
data.text: Its a unique building, a drive through but you can also order at window.  We were at Days Inn, so was nice to walk over to grab coffee, which is close to the main hwy.  Coffee was nice and strong, just the way we like it.

data.title: Always timely, always right
data.text: I always mobile order at this site, park under the Parkway sign, and walk up to the window, because the driveway is usually so stacked, that you can't get out of the parking lot.  They are quick, they are friendly, willing to answer questions, and my order has always been correct here.
